description:
When two surface molecules undergo a reaction in which both reagents are preserved, and in which both reagents change orientation, counting does not occur properly. 
Failure: as flippy increases, a000- and b000- remain 0. 
Success: a000- and b000- increase to non-zero values
 flippy increases
 at all times a000- + a000+ == 300
 at all times b000- + b000+ == 300
